digraph {
	rankdir=LR
	s [pos="-1,1.5!"]
	1 [pos="1,3!"]
	2 [pos="1.5,0!"]
	3 [pos="3,2!"]
	t [pos="4,.5!"]
	s -> 1 [label=0]
	s -> 2 [label=1]
	1 -> 2 [label=-1]
	1 -> 3 [label=1]
	2 -> t [label=0]
	3 -> 2 [label=0]
	3 -> t [label=1]
}
digraph {
	rankdir=LR
	s [pos="-1,1.5!"]
	1 [pos="1,3!"]
	2 [pos="1.5,0!"]
	3 [pos="3,2!"]
	t [pos="4,.5!"]
	s -> 1 [label=0]
	s -> 2 [label=1 color=red]
	1 -> 2 [label=-1]
	2 -> 1 [label=1 color=red]
	1 -> 3 [label=1 color=red]
	2 -> t [label=0]
	3 -> 2 [label=0]
	3 -> t [label=1 color=red]
}
